doc:
Roy Scheider https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roy_Scheider 0 Roy Richard Scheider (November 10, 1932 – February 10, 2008) was an American actor and amateur boxer. Scheider gained fame for his leading and supporting roles in several iconic films from the 1970s, playing NYPD Detective Buddy "Cloudy" Russo in The French Connection (1971); NYPD Detective Buddy Manucci in The Seven Ups (1973); Police Chief Martin Brody in Jaws (1975) and Jaws 2 (1978); Doc in Marathon Man (1976); choreographer and film director Joe Gideon (whose character was based on Bob Fosse) in All That Jazz (which was written and directed by Fosse) (1979); and Dr. Heywood R. Floyd in the 1984 film 2010, the sequel to 2001: A Space Odyssey. Scheider is also known for playing Captain Nathan Bridger in the science fiction television series seaQuest DSV (1993–1996). Described by AllMovie as "one of the most unique and distinguished of all Hollywood actors", Scheider was nominated for two Academy Awards, a Golden Globe Award and a BAFTA Award. Roy_Richard_Scheider ( November_10_,_1932 – February_10_,_2008 ) was an_American_actor and amateur_boxer . Scheider gained fame for his_leading and supporting roles in several_iconic_films from the_1970s , playing NYPD_Detective_Buddy_"_Cloudy_"_Russo in The_French_Connection ( 1971_) ; NYPD_Detective_Buddy_Manucci in The_Seven_Ups ( 1973_) ; Police_Chief_Martin_Brody in Jaws_(_1975_) and Jaws_2 ( 1978_) ; Doc in Marathon_Man_(_1976_) ; choreographer_and_film_director_Joe_Gideon_( whose_character was_based on Bob_Fosse ) in All_That_Jazz ( which was_written_and_directed by Fosse_)_(_1979_) ; and Dr._Heywood_R._Floyd in the_1984_film 2010 , the_sequel to 2001 : A_Space_Odyssey . Scheider is_also_known for playing Captain_Nathan_Bridger in the_science_fiction_television_series_seaQuest_DSV_(_1993 – 1996_) . Described by AllMovie as "_one of the_most_unique_and_distinguished of all_Hollywood_actors " , Scheider was_nominated for two_Academy_Awards , a_Golden_Globe_Award and a_BAFTA_Award .
